title: Manage a Commercial Apiary
description: A commercial beekeeper needs to manage inspection records and honey production for hundreds of hives.

tasks.description: Record the results of a hive inspection, including queen status, brood pattern, and signs of disease.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the inspection data for a specific hive.

tasks.description: Record the amount of honey harvested from a specific hive.
Generate a report showing the average honey production per hive and flag any underperforming hives for further inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report that identifies the bottom 10% of hives by production.
